short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser extension using Chrome's built-in AI for organizing text in a concise manner with a structure and bullet points.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension I built using Chrome's built-in AI for organizing text in a concise manner with a structure and bullet points. You simply input the thoughts to post, and on clicking the "Make it structured!" button, you get a response with section headings and bullet points. The sections are: "Background", "Updates", "Questions", "Action Items", and "tl;dr". This makes it very easy for your audience to consume what you have posted in an email or a chat.
